title: Cameos
author: JGray
text:
A few hours after I sent Keith the script for this page he IM'd me and asked if he could replace the talking heads in the middle panels with some of his own devising. I said sure! As a result, I have no idea who these people are or what their story is. He'll have to tell you.

The last two, however, are a pretty obvious homage to a man who can be a brilliant film writer but a sometimes moderate comic writer. Guess who!

replies.author: Ketira*Guest*
replies.text: <font class="Apple-style-span" face="Verdana">ARG!  I forgot to vote yesterday, so now I missed four strips of the SotA!  Any way to get them privately?</font>

replies.author: JimmyRei1000*Guest*
replies.text: Spoiler - It's the Cups universes' version of Jay and Silent Bob, of Clerks fame. If you've never seen the original, you should.

replies.author: Hogan*Guest*
replies.text: Who are they Keith!? We need to know!

replies.author: verias
replies.text: Panel 2 is Aleena, she's an avid fan of the comic, and leader of the Space Elves (http://www.space-elves.com)

replies.author: Hogan*Guest*
replies.text: Aaaah :DNow, that leaves Panel 3 to wonder about :p

replies.author: JGray
replies.text: Sorry, Hogan. He's someone we made up for the comic. No crossovers here for you to list. :(

replies.author: Hogan*Guest*
replies.text: Thanks! I wish all Artist & Creator teams would be just as considerate

replies.author: Katy*Guest*
replies.text: Love and Jay & Silent Bob cameo!  It made me LOL!  Kevin Smith RULES!!
